summary: This mod replaces the appearance of some males.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Sorry, English is not my native Language. So I don't understand well the meaning of comments. :'(

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61937-1-1423206923.jpg[/img]

Males of Skyrim[/b]

[b]Feature:[/b]
-This mod replaces the appearance of males.
-This is a Standalone mod. But this needs Hearthfire DLC.



List:
[b](v1.0)[/b]
Ralof
Hadvar
Vilkas
Farkas
Cicero
General Tullius
Ulfric Stormcloak
Markarth Housecarl - Argis the Bulwark
Windhelm Housecarl - Calder
Pale (Dawnstar) Housecarl - Gregor
Hjaalmarch (Morthal) Housecarl - Valdimar
Brynjolf

[b](v1.1)[/b]
Delvin Mallory
Marcurio
Stenvar
Vorstag
Belrand

[b](v1.2)[/b]
Erik the Slayer
Onmund
Benor
Roggi Knot-Beard
Cosnach

[b](v1.3)[/b]
Golldir
Faendal
Sven
Ahtar
Erandur



[b]Installation:[/b]
- Manual = Copy the content into DATA folder.
- Use Nexus Mod Manager for auto-install



[b]Credits:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951]Enhance Character Edit[/url] by tktk
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488]Better males[/url] by Chris57
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Male Body[/url] by Urshi
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url] by Urshi
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii
KS Hairdos - 400 by Kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411][/url][url=http://][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url] by Hvergelmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589]Natural Eyes[/url] by nevenbridge81
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192]Eyes of Aber[/url] (My Mod)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url] by Xenius

Thanks everyone!! :D



Q&A:
[b]If anyone encounter the neck line trouble...[/b]
Press a button ` key, and click the male.
Enter nether phrases in order.

setnpcweight XX
disable
enable

[b]XX is...[/b]
Ralof=75
Hadvar=50
Vilkas=40
Farkas=40
Cicero=30
General Tullius=70
Ulfric Stormcloak=70
Argis the Bulwark=100
Calder=30
Gregor=100
Valdimar=60
Brynjolf=40
Delvin Mallory=20
Marcurio=10
Stenvar=100
Vorstag=80
Belrand=40
Erik the Slayer=40
Onmund=20
Benor=90
Roggi Knot-Beard=70
Cosnach=50
Golldir=50
Faendal=40
Sven=40
Ahtar=90
Erandur=00


[b]If anyone want to  pick and choose a few of males...[/b]
I recommend to use TES5Edit.
Baibaihe introduced a youtube link about its directions (made by her).

[youtube]0l7NrahCM58[/youtube]
Tutorial Video by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/6906666-baibaihe/]Baibaihe[/url]. Thank you :D


[b]If anyone hate this mod...[/b]
Don't use my mod. Thank you :)


[b]History Log:[/b]
2015.01.23 v1.0 Released
2015.01.25 Add to change the appearance of some males
upload the loose version file
2015.02.06 Add to change the appearance of some males
2015.02.26 Add to change the appearance of some males
Fix the problem about werewolf form
2015.03.27 Adds 'Better Males Bring Out Your Dead version'. Thanks [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/1711848-rusey/]Rusey[/url] :)


[b]My Other Mod:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59192]Eyes of Aber[/url] (Adds 150 new eyes to male and female human and elf player character)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59273]Follower - Agatha[/url] (Adds a standalone female follower 'Agatha')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59362]Follower - Bella[/url] (Adds a standalone female darkelf follower 'Bella')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59419]Follower - Yeriel[/url] (Adds a standalone female follower 'Yeriel')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59970]Followers of Aber[/url] (Adds 3 standalone female followers)[/center]
